thread.title: “They’re dirty, blow people up in shopping centre, church, we’re going to win them” – Trump
thread.title_full: “They’re dirty, blow people up in shopping centre, church, we’re going to win them” – Trump

author: Tony
title: “They’re dirty, blow people up in shopping centre, church, we’re going to win them” – Trump
text:
Breaking News Translate Home » News » “They’re dirty, blow people up in shopping centre, church, we’re going to win them”– Trump “They’re dirty, blow people up in shopping centre, church, we’re going to win them”– Trump On 9:46 pm In News , Videos by Tony Comments 
U.S President, Donald Trump has said, in what seems like he is referring to Islamic terrorists, that “They are sneaky, dirty rats and they blow up people in a shopping centre, and they blow up people in a church,” adding that, “we are fighting sneaky rats right now that are sick and demented. And we’re going to win.” Tony
